response.overview: 12 animated stories from Echo Bridge Home Entertainment:  The Apostles The Miracles of Jesus The Last Supper, Crucifixion, and Resurrection Jonah and The Whale Life With Jesus Joseph and The Coat of Many Colors Daniel and The Lion's Den David and Goliath Samson and Delilah Sodom and Gomorrah The Story of Moses Joshua and The Battle of Jericho
response.title: 12 Bible Stories
